name: The Missing you
description:
UCSC Spring 2022

CMPM/ARTG 120  Game Design/ Development Experience

A Phaser Game

You have been kidnapped and have been filed as a missing person!

Find hidden clues and make your escape from the room!

Members:

Programming: Andi Barron

Art, Assets, Sound: Maya Brown

Arts, Assets, Animation: Ellen Kim

Through a monochrome palette and simple outlines, this game is shown through a sketch-like art style as the player is tasked to explore and find clues to escape. Through this stylistic choice, we aimed to create a mysterious aesthetic associated with puzzles.
